name: com.careboo.unity-algorand-sdk
description: Integrate your game with Algorand, a Pure Proof-of-Stake blockchain overseen by the Algorand Foundation. Create and sign Algorand transactions, use Algorand's REST APIs, and connect to any Algorand wallet supporting WalletConnect.

samples.description: Contains a scene for signing and submitting your first Algorand transaction.
Scripts that can be used to create Algorand Standard Assets (ASAs) in the Unity Editor.
Contains a scene that, when ran, will show a QR Code that can be scanned by any wallet supporting WalletConnect for Algorand.
Scripts that show proof of concepts for connecting wallets to the Unity Editor. Currently it only supports WalletConnect for connection.
Generate a GUI from a contract.json and call its smart contract methods.
Display NFTs following ARC-0064 in an Account.
